name: tm73
effect: Teaches Thunder Wave to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thunder Wave to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A weak electric charge is launched
at the foe. It causes paralysis if it
hits.

also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
